comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for connecting the two, swanq. They are definitely brothers. My first thought was that William was on the right in double portrait. But the hair  in this image is parted differently, and longer, more like the brother on the left.  What do you think?

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: My thought had been that William was on the left.  I'd probably put more weight on the parting of the hair than the length.  But I also see a difference around the eyes -- with this picture being more like the lefthand of the pair.  Interestingly, I'm reminded that parents have been known to part the hair of twins on opposite sides to help them identify them.  Perhaps they were twins.
